column2: Orodreth is the son of Finarfin and Eärwen. This was an editorial decision by Christopher Tolkien
column3: and an admitted mistake. Orodreth is actually Eärwens grandson
column4: the son of her child Angrod.

column1: The family-tree of Elwë shows only Eärwen as a child of Olwë. However
column2: in the text she is said to have brothers
column3: whose names are not mentioned in the narrative.
